Token.Abstract: Developers can import RMInteractiveSource in order to enable embedded interactivity in their RMMapView, RMMBTilesSource, and RMMapBoxSource objects. Interactivity is based on the UTFGrid specification and is best described by this web demo.
Returns YES if a tile source supports interactivity features.
Returns the HTML-formatted output for a given point on a given map view, considering the currently active interactive tile source.

Parameter.Name: outputType
Parameter.Abstract: The type of feature info desired.

Parameter.Name: point
Parameter.Abstract: A point in the map view.

Parameter.Name: mapView
Parameter.Abstract: The map view being interacted with.
